skins.selfIntroduction: As a member of the Soldati-class destroyers, I served as the leader of the 12th Destroyer Squadron and led my compatriots through many battles. No matter when or where, I shall give it my all to complete any mission!
skins.acquisition: Flagship Veneto's escort, Carabiniere of the Sardegna Empire, reporting for duty! As your subordinate, I will carry out your orders and complete any mission!
skins.details: Commander, I'm currently on patrol. Do you have any new instructions for me?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Royal submarines have always been elusive and mercurial. They've gotten the better of me in the past...
skins.secretaryIdle2: My gun? I'm telling you, it's real! I just don't have it loaded.
skins.secretaryIdle3: "Don't disturb during work hours." I put this sign up so you can have your peace of mind!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: P-please don't tease your subordinates like that!

skins.JPClientName: スッキリ日曜チョイス
skins.shipDescription: Lady Veneto advised me to enjoy my time off by changing into something befitting the occasion... Um, Commander, I d-don't look strange, do I?
skins.acquisition: Lady Veneto advised me to enjoy my time off by changing into something befitting the occasion... Um, Commander, I d-don't look strange, do I?
skins.login: Welcome back, Commander. W-would you like to accompany me on a walk while we both have some time off? S-sorry, I hope I'm not being pushy...
skins.details: I can't help but to feel a little different when I put on these clothes. I know it's supposed to feel light and refreshing, but instead I feel defenseless and nervous...
skins.secretaryIdle1: If you're thirsty, I brought some water. Here you go!
skins.secretaryIdle2: The warm sunlight, the gentle breeze, and an ice pop to beat the heat! That's the spirit of midsummer!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, I heard from a friend that all girls have multiple facets... When I changed into this outfit that I'd absolutely never wear normally... it, it was as if something awakened within me...
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander! Err, I mean, good day?
